actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purpose of authorizing flood insurance for breakwalls and other flood-prevention structures.

summary.text: Amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to include breakwalls and other flood-prevention structures within the flood insurance program. Limits such coverage to $10,000 aggregate liability if based on chargeable premium rates and $40,000 if based on estimated premium rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purpose of authorizing flood insurance for breakwalls and other flood-prevention structures.
